articles.author: Channing Reid
articles.title: Dinner Party Gone Bad: 700 Airbus Employees Sick After Celebration - Simple Flying
articles.description: Officials are looking into the cause of the Christmas nightmare.
articles.content:
Summary
  • Over 700 people experienced symptoms of food poisoning at a Christmas dinner hosted by Airbus Atlantic.
  • The cause of the illness is still unclear, but some employees have … [+3792 chars]
